author: IGN
description: There are few who can claim to be deserving of a brand new adjective but David Lynch was certainly one of them. A truly unique artist whose work was dark and strange and surreal and funny all in equal measure, his influences came from a place that may not exist anymore, and at some point he became the influence himself. While films will forever strive to be “Lynchian” we can be sure we’ll never see an artist quite like David Lynch again.
title: RIP David Lynch: They Don’t Make ‘Em Like Him Anymore

author: IGN
description: When it comes to hardware sales, Nintendo usually doesn't fail. From the smash success of the DS line, all the way back to their roots with the NES and even some of their more unorthodox hardware. It's hard to think of a Nintendo console not doing well. While the Switch has proven to be a financial and critical success in every way possible, it wasn't that long ago when Nintendo’s hardware was in a tough position with low sales, mediocre software, and a general lack of interest in the Wii U. In this episode of IGN Rewind, we dive into how the missteps of the Wii's successor paved the way for the creation of one of the best-selling consoles of all time—the Nintendo Switch.
title: How Nintendo's Wii U Failed So The Switch Could Succeed | IGN Rewind

author: IGN
description: Check out 15 minutes of gameplay of Dragonyhm, a Game Boy Color RPG from Spacebot Interactive. This gameplay was captured on the new Chromatic, a brand-new handheld from ModRetro.
title: Dragonyhm: First 15 Minutes of Chromatic Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest 'It's Time' trailer for Captain America: Brave New World, the next installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios and releasing on February 14.

Take a new look at Marvel Studios’ Captain America: Brave New World for this upcoming movie starring Anthony Mackie, Danny Ramirez, Shira Haas, Xosha Roquemore, Carl Lumbly, with Giancarlo Esposito, Liv Tyler, Tim Blake Nelson, and Harrison Ford. Marvel Studios’ Captain America: Brave New World opens in theaters on February 14, 2025.

Marvel Studios’ Captain America: Brave New World follows Sam Wilson, who after meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, finds himself in the middle of an international incident. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red.

The film is directed by Julius Onah and produced by Kevin Feige and Nate Moore. Louis D’Esposito and Charles Newirth serve as executive producers.
title: Captain America: Brave New World - Official 'It's Time' Trailer (2025) Anthony Mackie, Harrison Ford

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Drop Duchy in this new trailer for the upcoming strategy rougelite hybrid game where territories are built and claimed one geometric block at a time. The new Drop Duchy trailer shows us how to use its block-dropping mechanics to collect resources and recruit troops to fight against belligerent armies. Drop Duchy will be available on PC in April 2025. A demo for Drop Duchy is out now on Steam.

#DropDuchy #Gaming #IGN
title: Drop Duchy - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out this cinematic gameplay trailer for Night Is Coming, the upcoming Slavic folklore-inspired survival-strategy game. Wishlist it on PC if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1011590/Night_is_Coming/
title: Night Is Coming - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: The Nintendo Switch 2 is officially announced and perhaps the biggest surprise, is that it isn't very surprising at all. From the form to function, this is very much a bigger, more powerful Switch and that's a good thing.
title: Switch 2's Big Twist Is That It Plays It Safe, And That’s 100% The Right Move

title: Can you identify a Keanu Reeves "Whoa" ? #sonicmovie3 #sonic #benschwartz #keanureeves #shadow #ign

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Sony has canceled a couple more games, both of which were live service titles. One of them was a God of War multiplayer game, and the other was an unannounced game from Bluepoint. Looks like Sony could be scaling back their live service push in the wake of the colossal failure of Concord. In other news, the devs behind Hollow Knight: Silksong potentially teased...something. A cryptic tweet involving a dessert profile picture have lead some to believe a Silksong announcement is coming with Nintendo's big Switch 2 Direct in April. And finally there's a new Steam Deck, only you can't buy it and it would probably be bad to play games on. To celebrate Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth's Steam Deck verification, Square Enix showed off a chocobo-themed Steam Deck complete with chocobo fur. Not the best way to play a handheld that can get very without the extra sweater.
title: God of War Multiplayer Reportedly Among PlayStation's Latest Cancelled Projects - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
